content:
I have deprecated codes in my codeSystem, this causes TWO columns to show up in my IG rendered codeSystem. Both "Stats" and "Deprecated" show up. Is there a way to just get one column?
For example see http://build.fhir.org/ig/IHE/FormatCode/branches/master/CodeSystem-formatcode.html

@Grahame Grieve this is still giving me two columns: "Deprecated" and "status"
see http://build.fhir.org/ig/IHE/FormatCode/branches/master/CodeSystem-formatcode.html
I haven't done the next release yet
